title: Morning Coffee
description: Start your day right with a blend of upbeat tunes, local weather, and community announcements. Sarah J. brings you the perfect mix to wake up to.

title: Local News Hour
description: In-depth coverage of the stories directly affecting our valley. Town council updates, school board meetings, and local sports.

title: Lunchtime Jazz
description: Smooth jazz, bebop, and fusion to accompany your midday break. Marcus curates a sophisticated selection of standards and modern cuts.

title: Community Voices
description: An open platform for local non-profits, artists, and organizers to discuss their work and upcoming events.

title: Tech Talk
description: Demystifying technology for everyone. Dave covers the latest gadgets, digital privacy tips, and local tech initiatives.

title: Valley Voices
description: Exploring the rich history of our region through interviews with long-time residents and local historians.

title: Midweek Mix
description: An eclectic mix of indie, rock, and pop to get you over the hump. Expect the unexpected.

title: Friday Night Live
description: Live recordings of local bands performing at venues around the valley. Support local music!

title: Market Live Remote
description: Broadcasting live from the Valley Harvest Community Market. Interviews with vendors and shoppers.

title: Sunday Best
description: Gospel, soul, and inspirational music to uplift your spirit on Sunday mornings.

title: Evening Chill
description: Downtempo beats and ambient soundscapes to wind down your day.
